info.title: Variant Table
info.description: Variant tables are used to store combinations of values for different characteristics. You can use them in selection conditions, procedures, and constraints. You can query each entity to retrieve the corresponding business data.

x-sap-shortText: Create, delete and read basic data, language-specific descriptions, columns and the value assignment alternative, update basic data and language-specific descriptions of a variant table with this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Product Lifecycle Management - Variant Configuration Integration(SAP_COM_0751)
[Set Up Configurable Model using Variant Configuration(22T)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/22T " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET VarCnfTblValAssgmtAlternative HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

VarConfignTblCstmStorIsActive.title: Active link
VarConfignTblCstmStorIsActive.description: Ind. link between variant table and database table active

CreatedByUser.title: Created By
CreatedByUser.description: Name of Person Responsible for Creating the Object

LastChangedByUser.title: Changed By
LastChangedByUser.description: Name of Person Who Changed Object

VarCnfTblCstmStorLnkLstChgDate.title: Date
VarCnfTblCstmStorLnkLstChgDate.description: Date: link between variant table and database tab. activated

VarCnfTblCstmStorLnkLstChgTime.title: Time
VarCnfTblCstmStorLnkLstChgTime.description: Time when link between database tab. and var. tab. activated

VarCnfTblCstmStorLnkLastChgdBy.title: Link activated by
VarCnfTblCstmStorLnkLastChgdBy.description: User that activated link between database tab. and var. tab.

VarConfignTblLstChgDateTime.title: Date/Time of last Change to Table Struc.

VarConfignTblColumnPosition.title: Item
VarConfignTblColumnPosition.description: Item number of characteristic in variant table
